name: Talking Dog Husky Puppy
description:
Just talk to the Talking Dog Husky Puppy. The cute dog puppy answers with his funny voice and reacts to what you say or your touch. With a lot of exciting games with many levels to play!

If you like talking animal games, virtual dog games or animal games in general then you will love this virtual pet app Talking Dog Husky Puppy!

★★★ Features: ★★★
✔ High quality 3D graphics
✔ Talking animal: talking dog, talking puppy, talking husky
✔ Dog game - dog games
✔ The dog repeats everything you say with a funny voice
✔ Fun for the whole family

Talking Dog Husky Puppy is a free application. Download Talking Dog Husky Puppy now and please rate it with 5 stars if you like it.
